archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: EXT: YesPay
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Used in the self-serve kiosks (SSKs) in branch to take card payments, using YesPay as the merchant acquirer. Note: There are plans to replace these with Ingenico devices using Global Pay as the MA as part of Point-to-point encryption to reduce the scope of PCI compliance but this has yet to receive funding.
